001package Corner_Detection_Tests;
002
003import java.awt.Color;
004import java.awt.Graphics2D;
005import java.awt.Shape;
006import java.awt.geom.AffineTransform;
007import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
008import java.awt.geom.PathIterator;
009import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
010import java.util.LinkedList;
011import java.util.List;
012
013import ij.IJ;
014import ij.ImagePlus;
015import ij.gui.Roi;
016import ij.gui.ShapeRoi;
017import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
018import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
019import imagingbook.lib.image.ImageGraphics;
020import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
021import imagingbook.pub.corners.Corner;
022import imagingbook.pub.corners.GradientCornerDetector;
023import imagingbook.pub.corners.HarrisCornerDetector;
024import imagingbook.pub.corners.HarrisCornerDetector.Parameters;
025import imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel.SubpixelMaxInterpolator.Method;
026import imagingbook.pub.corners.util.CornerOverlay;
027import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Point;
028
029/**
030 * Creates a small image containing a single rotated rectangle.
031 * @author WB
032 *
033 */
034public class Make_Corner_Test_Image5 implements PlugIn {
035        
036        // size of the original image
037        static int origWidth = 64;
038        static int origHeight = 64;
039        
040        static int angleDeg = 20; //10; 20; 30;
041        
042        static double rectW = 30;
043        static double rectH = 50;
044        
045        double angle = angleDeg / 180.0 * Math.PI;
046        
047        double cornerSize = 1.5;
048        
049        double cornerStrokeWidth = 0.25;
050        Color cornerColor = Color.blue;
051        Color renderBoxColor = Color.red;
052        Color cornerBoxColor = Color.green.darker();
053
054        Rectangle2D rectOrig;
055        Shape rectRotated;
056        ByteProcessor ip;
057        
058        @Override
059        public void run(String arg) {
060                
061                IJ.log("angle = " + (angle / Math.PI * 180));
062
063                ip = new ByteProcessor(origWidth, origHeight);
064                ip.setColor(128);
065                ip.fill();
066                
067                double xc = 0.5 * origWidth;
068                double yc = 0.5 * origHeight;
069                
070                rectOrig = new Rectangle2D.Double(xc - rectW/2, yc - rectH/2, rectW, rectH);
071                AffineTransform R = AffineTransform.getRotateInstance(angle, xc, yc);
072                
073//              AffineTransform T = AffineTransform.getTranslateInstance(2.3, 0);
074                rectRotated = R.createTransformedShape(rectOrig);
075                
076                try (ImageGraphics ig = new ImageGraphics(ip)) {
077                        ig.setColor(255);
078//                      g.setLineWidth(0);
079                        Graphics2D g2 = ig.getGraphics();
080                        g2.fill(rectRotated);
081                }
082                
083//              runTest(Method.QuadraticTaylorCoeff); //Method.QuadraticLeastSquares; //Method.Quartic; //Method.Parabolic; //Method.None; //
084                runTest(Method.QuarticInterpolation);
085                runTest(Method.None);
086        }
087        
088        void runTest(Method subPixMethod) {
089                Parameters params = new Parameters();
090                params.doCleanUp = false;
091                params.border = 2;
092                params.maxLocatorMethod = subPixMethod;
093                GradientCornerDetector cd = new HarrisCornerDetector(ip, params);
094                List<Corner> corners = cd.getCorners();
095                
096//              CornerOverlay.DefaultMarkerSize = 3;
097                CornerOverlay oly = new CornerOverlay();
098//              oly.strokeColor(Color.green);
099//              oly.strokeWidth(1.0);
100                //oly.addItems(corners);
101
102                // draw the true rectangle
103//              List<Point> rectPoints = getPoints(rectR);
104//              Roi roiR = makePolygon(rectPoints);
105                Roi roiR = new ShapeRoi(rectRotated);
106                roiR.setStrokeColor(renderBoxColor);
107                roiR.setStrokeWidth(0.25);
108                oly.addRoi(roiR);
109                        
110                // find the closest corner for each rectangle point
111                List<Point> cornerPoints = new LinkedList<>();
112                List<Point> rectPoints = getPoints(rectRotated);
113                for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
114                        Point p = rectPoints.get(i);
115                        Corner c = findClosest(p, corners);
116                        cornerPoints.add(c);
117                }
118                        
119                // create the detected corner polygon
120                Roi roiC = makePolygon(cornerPoints);
121                roiC.setStrokeColor(cornerBoxColor);
122                roiC.setStrokeWidth(0.25);
123                oly.addRoi(roiC, true);
124                
125                
126                // add corners (on top)
127                oly.strokeColor(cornerColor);
128                oly.strokeWidth(cornerStrokeWidth);
129                oly.setCornerSize(2);
130                for (Corner c : corners) {
131                        //oly.addRoi(makeCrossShape(c.getX(), c.getY()), true);
132                        oly.addItem(c);
133                }
134                
135                ImagePlus im = new ImagePlus("RectCorners-" + angleDeg + "-" + subPixMethod.name(), ip);
136                im.setOverlay(oly);
137                im.show();
138        }
139        
140        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
141        
142//      ShapeRoi makeCrossShape(double xc, double yc) {
143//              Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
144//              path.moveTo(xc - cornerSize, yc);
145//              path.lineTo(xc + cornerSize, yc);
146//              path.moveTo(xc, yc - cornerSize);
147//              path.lineTo(xc, yc + cornerSize);
148//              ShapeRoi cross = new ShapeRoi(path);
149//              cross.setStrokeWidth(cornerStrokeWidth);
150//              cross.setStrokeColor(cornerColor);
151//              return cross;
152//      }
153        
154        void listPoints(Shape s) {
155                IJ.log("rectangle: ");
156                PathIterator pi = s.getPathIterator(null);
157                double[] coords = new double[6];
158                while (!pi.isDone()) {
159                        pi.currentSegment(coords);
160                        IJ.log("  " + Matrix.toString(coords));
161                        pi.next();
162                }
163        }
164        
165        List<Point> getPoints(Shape s) {
166                List<Point> points = new LinkedList<>();
167                PathIterator pi = s.getPathIterator(null);
168                double[] coords = new double[6];
169                while (!pi.isDone()) {
170                        pi.currentSegment(coords);
171                        points.add(Point.create(coords[0], coords[1]));
172                        pi.next();
173                }
174                return points;
175        }
176        
177        Corner findClosest(Point p, List<Corner> corners) {
178                Corner minCorner = null;
179                double minDist = Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
180                for (Corner c : corners) {
181                        double dist2 = p.distance2(c);
182                        if (dist2 < minDist) {
183                                minCorner = c;
184                                minDist = dist2;
185                        }
186                }
187                return minCorner;
188        }
189        
190        ShapeRoi makePolygon(List<Point> points) {
191                Point[] pa = points.toArray(new Point[0]);
192                Path2D poly = new Path2D.Double();
193                poly.moveTo(pa[0].getX(), pa[0].getY());
194                for (int i=1; i<pa.length; i++) {
195                        poly.lineTo(pa[i].getX(), pa[i].getY());
196                }
197                poly.closePath();
198                return new ShapeRoi(poly);
199        }
200        
201//      Roi makePolygon(List<Point> points) {
202//              Point[] pointA = points.toArray(new Point[0]);
203//              
204//              float[] xPoints = new float[pointA.length];
